com.practo.jedi.wplanner.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.practo.jedi.wplanner.controllers.UserController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/users")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    UserController handles the requests based on users create, update, get ,get posted user trips and get user signed up trips.
    Author:
    teja
